## UserModel class

User datamodel which is used by [UserBDTO](./clm-core.userbdto.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class UserModel extends BaseDatamodel implements iUserModel 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseDatamodel](./clm-core.basedatamodel.md)

<b>Implements:</b> [iUserModel](./clm-core.iusermodel.md)
